articles.description: Barring Chambal Fertilizers amp Chemicals which has shed 19 per cent on YTD basis most of the other fertilizers stock have logged gains so far in 2022 Deepak Fertilisers has zoomed 148 per cent
articles.content: Shares of fertilizer companies were in focus in trades on Thursday after the Union Cabinet approved a subsidy of around Rs 51,875 crore on nutrients, specifically Nitrogen (N), Phosphorus (P), Potash… [+88 chars]

articles.title: 20,000 Ola Electric Scooters Sold In October – Highest Ever - India Car News
articles.description: According to the Vahan portal, Ola Electric managed to dispatch 20,000 units of the electric scooters in October 2022. The company became India’s first EV marker to achieve such highest sales numbers. Ola registered a 60 per cent month on month growth that tr…
